attributes.action: Make ALL disabled parking spaces Mandatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now time to make all marked disabled parking spaces mandatory by that i mean 2 things 
1, A disabled bay outside someones house is for their use only , Fine and removal of offending vehicle for misuse 

2 More active patrolling of public use disabled bays with a similar fine and removal of vehicle  for misuse

I for one am getting tired of returning home only to find a vehicle parked in my disabled bay  then to find it is someone in the local pub  , who then turns around and tells you to **** off they are only white lines you cant do a thing
